name: NXP Semiconductors Netherlands B.V.
goal: NXP Semiconductors creates solutions that enable secure connections for a smarter world. Building on its expertise in high-performance mixed-signal electronics, NXP is driving innovation in the areas of connected cars, cyber security, portables & wearables, and the Internet of Things.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Industrial Policy; Cyber Security; Privacy; Smart Mobility ; EU Funding; Horizon 2020 (Framework Programme + ECSEL JU); Innovation Union; EU Trade policy; Innovation Policy, Ditigal Agenda, Information Society, Research and Technology, Certification & Standardisation
